00008 ORDGF4cEnergyTreeWriter::ORDGF4cEnergyTreeWriter(string treeName) :
00009 ORVTreeWriter(new ORDGF4cEventDecoder, treeName)
00010 {
00011   fEventDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORDGF4cEventDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00012   fEventTime = 0;
00013   fCrate = 0;
00014   fCard = 0;
00015   fChannel = 0;
00016   fEnergy = 0;
00017   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();
00018 }

00020 ORDGF4cEnergyTreeWriter::~ORDGF4cEnergyTreeWriter()
00021 {
00022   delete fEventDecoder;
00023 }

00025 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cEnergyTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00026 {
00027   fTree->Branch("eventTime", &fEventTime, "eventTime/D");
00028   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/s");
00029   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/s");
00030   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/s");
00031   fTree->Branch("energy", &fEnergy, "energy/S");
00032   return kSuccess;
00033 }
00034 
00035 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cEnergyTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00036 {
00037   fEventDecoder->SetDataRecord(record);
00038   for (size_t i = 0; i < fEventDecoder->GetDGFNEvents(); i++) {
00039     for (size_t k = 0; k < fEventDecoder->GetNChannels(i); k++) {
00040       // check severity to improve speed:
00041       if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00042         ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): " 
00043                       << "event-time-crate-card-channel-energy = "
00044                       << i << "-" 
00045                       << fEventDecoder->GetDGFEventTime(i) << "-"
00046                       << fEventDecoder->CrateOf() << "-"
00047                       << fEventDecoder->CardOf() << "-" 
00048                       << k << "-"
00049                       << fEventDecoder->GetChanEnergy(i,k) << endl;
00050       }
00051       fEventTime = fEventDecoder->GetDGFEventTime(i);
00052       fCrate = fEventDecoder->CrateOf();
00053       fCard = fEventDecoder->CardOf();
00054       fChannel = k;
00055       fEnergy = fEventDecoder->GetChanEnergy(i,k);
00056       fTree->Fill();
00057     }
00058   }
00059   return kSuccess;
00060 }
